title: (x) Brand Watcher graphic identity - ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ Alternates {Nicolai}
content:
Hi Guys,

Anyone know the font being used on he business cards (brand watcher)?

[http://www.konstruct.de/issue\_03/works/Brandwatcher/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109114806/http:/www.konstruct.de/issue_03/works/Brandwatcher/index.html)

Chris
author: kristo

comments.content: A slightly modified Avant Garde w. alternates

Oddly enough, “BRAND” reads more like BRAVID because of the alternates and alterations.

To misquote Ed Benguiat, “The only place Avant Garde Gothic looked good was on the cover of Avant Garde.”
